resources.string: How can I find a movie?
To find a film, you just have to click the search button on the top right of the screen and type the title of the film you want to look for.
How can I add a film to the database?

You can access the creation form to add a film to the database by clicking "Add film" on the navigation drawer or by clicking the red button with a plus on the bottom right of your screen. There you will have to introduce the characteristics of the film like title, director, protagonist, year of release and rating.
How can I remove a film from the database?
You can delete any desired film by searching it and swiping it either right or left.
Can I recover a film after removing it?
You can, but just for a few moments after deleting it. A snackbar will appear at the bottom of the screen giving the option of undoing your action.
Can I save a film of my interest and access it later?

Yes. Whenever you find a film you want to save, you can tap button on its top right, above the rating, to save it to your watchlist. You can then access to your watchlist by clicking it on the navigation drawer menu. You can also remove a film from your watchlist by swiping it right or left on your watchlist.
